documents.document: #BigBets this weekend - $2,000 Andado @ $2. $8,000 Its Our Showtime @ $4.80. $5,000 Volpe Veloce @ $3.60 & $5,000 Hasahalo @ $5.50.

Telegraph - most popular runner in first 24 hrs of trading is the Baker/@ForsmanAndrew trained filly Luna Rossa (5th fav @ $9).
Filly to take on the older horses - Group 1 Sires winner Luna Rossa has been late nom'd for this Sat's Telegraph. Quoted @ $12 in Futures.
A strong push since FF betting commenced on Savile Row $4.8-$3.8 in the Group 1 Levin Classic. Could be fav by the end of the day!
@HuntRacing (2/2) Opportunity to move to Oaks Day & have a Grp 1 for 3yo sprinters over 1400m replacing the Welly Guineas. Mr Tiz as lead up
(1/2) With the continual stakes increase for the Karaka 3yo Mile, the powers that be should consider rescheduling the Levin Classic.
The Robert Smerdon trained Odyssey Moon quoted @ $7 for the Telegraph. Also Shadow Fox @ $26 for the Thorndon, note both not nominated.
